Reviews.Title: “Great place for a Dubai visit”
Reviews.Author: Lesley261613
Reviews.Content: we stayed at the Pearl Residence for 4 days in January 2012. This hotel is extremely good value for money. The breakfasts were very good with a good selections of hot/cold foods, the rooms were spacious, with lots of storage space. The staff were very helpful and the location was ideal. We had a 25 min walk to The Creek, 5 min to the Mall and Metro station. We would certainly stay here again if we had another trip to Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “Stay somewhere else!”
Reviews.Author: Steven1957
Reviews.Content: This would have to be one of the worst hotels that we have ever experienced. There was even crusty old meals left in the fridge and the place was filthy. We were supposed to have a room that would sleep four, but ended up with the children being on a different floor level to us which was totally unacceptable. The most surprising thing is that this hotel was recommended and booked through Emirates. We would definitely not go back.

Reviews.Title: “something for something”
Reviews.Author: mitteway
Reviews.Content: I can highly recommend this hotel. The location is great, the staff are very friendly and helpful. The booked double room was surprisingly large, as was the bathroom. And wasn't so expensive like in total Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “one of the best”
Reviews.Author: Emad A
Reviews.Content: one of the best around, centre location everything close, good for all types

Reviews.Title: “Pearl Residence, poor Second Cousin to other Dubai Properties!”
Reviews.Author: SusanatHobart
Reviews.Content: The Pearl was listed in the Emirates handbook as Three Stars (as I can't find the little handbook I cannot confirm this - it possibly could have been a 2 star). The transfer service to the Pearl was in a small bus type and was good. We were greeted warmly at the Pearl, and shown to our dated one bedroom apartment. Kitchen, Dining and Lounge, and a comfortable queen size bed. The bathroom was a shiny marble one, shower over the bath, and there was also a seperate toilet elsewhere in the apartment. There was no washing machine, something that we thought would be included. The kitchen was not well equipped, and so we didn't use the facilities much We were disappointed with the apartment overall, I think comparably to Australia it was a 2 star! After our first night there we warmed to the place, it was all we needed it to be, though it was the standard wasn't what we expected. The Pearl is close to some small supermarkets, about a large block away from the underground air-conditioned train service. A large shopping mall, the BurJuman, is also a block away. As another comment suggested, pay a little extra and get something that is a little classier and up-to-date.

Reviews.Title: “Rip off”
Reviews.Author: Kanyada
Reviews.Content: not worth the dhs. Think its overpriced Felt sick when i saw the facilities at other hotels for a fraction of the price. And was shocked to see roaches in the room. Another big problem, expensive internet....is there a hotel that has this for free in Dubai? And i am not referring to internet in the lobby......i mean free internet in the room! i however enjoyed the breakfast...

Reviews.Title: “No! No! Not worth any price”
Reviews.Author: takrish
Reviews.Content: Don't go by the exterior look! The room are really old and kitchen outdated and not good for any family. Moreover we travelled from US and after 16 hour flight we wanted to get some rest and they had a party going on at 1am-4am which made us sleepless for 4 more hours. The front desk wasn't helpful at all and I called them they I wasn't happy and they checked us out of hotel saying they have customers in wait list and we can find other properties if we are not happy. I can't accept this kind of service and I will not recommend to anyone especially if you going with a family. The airport shuttle vehicle really sucked even though we pay $50.

Reviews.Title: “Not the real Dubai experience”
Reviews.Author: MrASB
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 4 nights in February 2010. I decided to go cheap and cheerful as I was going alone. It's far from the real Dubai experience, Beach is relatively far, shops are quite some distance. The shops that are local just sell the usual brick and brack, Couple of food places etc etc. At night the near by bars at other hotels open up and things change around this area. Its far from a sleazy area however, the constant small gathering of foreign women at certain corners does suggest something. But its not all doom and gloom, Dubai is a beautiful place and the wonders of this City are only a taxi away. (20 odd minutes to Emirates mall) Back to the hotel, It doesn't consist of what you'd expect from Dubai. No plasma TV's screens in the rooms, No fancy toiletry or furniture. Very basic (microwave, fridge, Oven, two baths, bedroom and living area) but it does serve its purpose. However, when going out and seeing all these other superb hotels, some which are only 40 odd pounds extra per night, You do think ''Maybe next time Ill stay here''. Staff are basic yet helpful, food wasn't to my liking, Rooms are very basic. But its not too bad! Would I stay here again? No! Only because I have already and know Id rather spend another £40 per night and live in a better part of Dubai, Where I feel more like a King not a poorper. Regards

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: JaneB89
Reviews.Content: we had an awesome stay here last week, very cheap if book online and in advance, and although the rooms are a bit tired and kitchen cutlery/plates not all there this did not hamper the trip, even has a washing machine - the staff were more than pleasant and the roof top pool clean and good - we had it to ourselves every day...would definately stay here again - u have to get the taxi drivers used to where it is however when you explain it is behind the Bur Jurman shopping centre we had no problems

Reviews.Title: “terrible”
Reviews.Author: iamanumenorean
Reviews.Content: The rooms are the most basic with very little amenities. The fully stocked kitchen is a sham and there is no free internet. The rooms are tidy but for the rates are exorbitant. The staff do not know the city properly. We were told that the abra station is a 15 minute walk from the hotel whereas it actually was nearly an hour away.

Reviews.Title: “Not the best!!”
Reviews.Author: Hollinside
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Pearl Residences having booked a stopover through Emirates airlines whilst heading to Asia. On the face of it I thought it was good value for money. However on arrival I was pleased with the frontage and general fascade of the building, reception staff pleasant, but unfortunately the standard of the room in terms of cleanliness was extremely disappointing and smelled of cigarette smoke. The rooms are in fact apartments with cooking and dining facilities. The cleanliness of the kitchen appliances left a lot to be desired with food stains on the cooking hobs and table. The fridge had not been cleaned and the trays inside were still stained from previous occupants. The bathroom was in fact disgusting with stained / cracked tiles running down the shower/bath wall and the grouting round the bath in need of replacement. There were no towels in the bathroom on our arrival and took two calls to reception to rectify. It is such a pity as the standard of the room detract from what could be a nice hotel the public areas are spotless as are the Gym/Sauna/Steam?Pool facilities. This hotel badly needs a refurb in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel good service but internet is too expensive to use and for pushchairs no ramp by the door”
Reviews.Author: bisfamily63
Reviews.Content: overall a good experience.breakfast was quite cold never hot enough .nothing too posh.only downsides were no ramps .lifts were fast and the van provided for daily beach transport.which was a good side.

Reviews.Title: “happy with the hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kymmi55
Reviews.Content: I stayed there as a 4 night stopover. The room was huge as was the bed and the place was very clean, the staff were friendly and helpful - they draw on a map where I was and where I wanted to go (I was staying there by myself). I felt save the whole time I was there. The location was good - walking distance to the mall, grocery store. I can't find anything wrong with it.

Reviews.Title: “Just stayed 6 nights”
Reviews.Author: Couple_asking_info
Reviews.Content: We have just stayed there 6nights in total. We were in a suite room and most of their rooms are suite.Very clean large rooms with microwave, kettle, utensils etc.Great value. Not too close to the subway and The mall specially in 48degrees! But very helpful staff, very respectful. Thank you to front desk attendents Renato and İnam, awesome people. Thank you to Raj the bellboy with mustach and thank you to front desk manager Mr Kumar.Will come again and stay with kids.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Shamim112
Reviews.Content: I spent 3 nights at the Pearl Residence with my teenage daughter and we were very pleased indeed. There was no problem checking in or checking out. The staff were very pleasant. The room was cleaned every day and fresh towels and toiletries replaced as too was the bedding. The apartments are in walking distance of the Burjuman Shopping Centre, Centrepoint Shopping Centre and Spinneys Supermarket. The main road is only a few minutes away where you can get a cab very easily. Breakfast time was busy, which is a good sign. There was a good selection of breakfast items and plentiful. I would be prepared to stay there again without a shadow of a doubt. Accommodation is basic but clean and good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: shan29
Reviews.Content: This hotel apartment was booked by my office, which I was just joing from 1st December. Being relatively new to Dubai (has only taken stop overs a few times before), my only request to my office was to book me in Bur Dubai. To start off, the airport pick up was not good as the car sent was pretty noisy and not that clean. But when me and my wife stepped inside the hotel, we were pleasantly surprised at the cleanliness of the lobby and reception area. Check in was done in less than 2 minutes and we were soon on the 7th floor in our studio appartment. The rooms were clean, staff was very friendly and teh service was impeccable. The restaurant staff and the room service guys were more than happy to accept our requests. Since we stayed there for 15 days, most of the staff became quite friendly with us after a few days. Their food was very tasty and not very expensive also. The breakfast spread was lavish and the behaviour of the staff really made us feel at home.

Reviews.Title: “Worst service I have never seen”
Reviews.Author: RajasthanIndia
Reviews.Content: This is very very worst and terrible hotel I have ever never seen. The service is very very bad and worst . the persons at the reception is very rude and arrogant to the customers. The breakfast is very normal is not at all great.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Service”
Reviews.Author: uk2cairo
Reviews.Content: Stay away from this hotel, service, location and staffs behavior no good at all

Reviews.Title: “I Dont Recommend This Hotel, It Was Terrible”
Reviews.Author: online607600
Reviews.Content: i will not advise anyone to stay here the reception service was terrible,not a good choice rather stay at the grand hyatt

Reviews.Title: “Great for Dubai Stopover”
Reviews.Author: Travel_Agent_16_05
Reviews.Content: Great, Great, Great Location! Just down the road from the main shopping centre in Dubai. Breakfast at hotel - is really bad! But that is what people in Dubai think an America Breakfast is, its just normal. We arrived in on a very early morning flight, they were the most helpful staff knwoing that we were super tired and get lagged. I coukdnt tahnk them enough. I would definately recommend this property but just to stopovers for 1 - 4 nights. Probably not any longer.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible! Everything from Service to Rooms, Bathrooms need serious renovation!!!”
Reviews.Author: krishi_9
Reviews.Content: I stayed there with my husband, sister and bro in law for 3 nights and when we checked into our room it had a bad smell, our room did not smell but the bathroom was dirty with cracked tiles and cheap toiletries!!! The day reception were friendly but the night recepetions by the name of Ronny was as rude as can be, refused to give us extra room cards and snubbed us when we asked about local restaruants!!!! Supposed to stay for 5 nights could only manage 3 that is how bad it was.

Reviews.Title: “I was happy with it!!”
Reviews.Author: negar_9
Reviews.Content: I find this hotel in the internet(booking.com) .It was a clean,big and comfortable 2 bedroom appartment.staff were so nice and frindly. The location was good,short walk to Emirats mall and metro station,and a good super market next to the hotel. just our room curtain didn't work,and they didn't fix it during our stay!!

Reviews.Title: “grotty”
Reviews.Author: ronshaKent
Reviews.Content: This is an Aparthotel in need of redecoration and refurbishment in rooms. Although clean, and some of the fittings in the bathroom appeared to be new, the tiles around the Bath were disgusting. The Hotel is in the middle of the business district and is totally unsuitable for a short leisure break as it's over 40 minutes away from the Jumeirah Beach Area.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: RiyadhCupcake
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for a long weekend. The reception staff were very pleasant and helpful. When we checked in, there was leak in the bathroom ceiling that was promptly repaired. The breakfast was more than adequate. It was a good, solid budget hotel.

Reviews.Title: “the reception peaple are rude”
Reviews.Author: avi02
Reviews.Content: dat place is depressing,,the staff is very not friendly,and they was always a shortage of toiletrys and the male receptions are very rude..wud neva go back to that hotel

Reviews.Title: “Don't be fooled by its looks”
Reviews.Author: MuhammadC
Reviews.Content: The hotel looks good from the outside but the interior has much to be desired. Rooms are spacious but depressing. Bathrooms leaked. The location is good as there is a shopping mall just behind the hotel. Also, the night market during the shopping festival is walking distance. Although, if you want to go to the Mall of the emirates or Jumeirah beach, it is a distance. If you do decide on this hotel, it is difficult to find a taxi on the road. Rather go to the mall and get a taxi from there. Avoid traffic between 4 and 6pm.

Reviews.Title: “Basic, Tacky, Only for Business!”
Reviews.Author: VeryGCGirl
Reviews.Content: My husband and i, and our 15yr old daughter stayed in Pearl Residence on a stopover. The hotel is located in an average area, that I would not recommend for holidays. The foyer was tacky and the furnishings in general were very average. The room we stayed in had a bedroom with ensuite, seperate living area and kitchenette and seperate toilet. The walls were painted an awful pastel green and the couch and chairs in the living room were very basic. The bed my daughter slept on in the bedroom was fine but the sheets were threadbare and barely fit the bed! There were visible stains, and the room did not feel properly cleaned at all. The staff were very friendly and helpful though, and spoke english very well. The porters took our bags with no complaint up the front entrance stairs as we got out of the taxi. The receptionist was very helpful and friendly and organized a dhow dinner cruise for us that night. I would only recommend this hotel if you are staying in Dubai on business or on a stopover (and you only want to sleep!), and are looking to save money. The hotel is near empty construction lots and a taxi is needed to get to the tourists spots. I would not recommend staying in Bur Dubai area or Deira for those on holiday. However it was reasonably close to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced”
Reviews.Author: 5680mn
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the Pearl Residence Hotel for 2 night stopver in Dubai. The rooms are very big and relatively clean. For some or other reason my room smelled like gas was leaking. I thought the hotel was a bit overpriced for the location and general rundown feeling it had. Staff service was efficient. You have to walk down to reception for wireless internet voucher which is inconvenient and expensive. The hotel is however 150 meteres walk from a large mall which is convenient. In conclusion not to bad, but it just has a rundown feeling.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: leelee1Melbourne
Reviews.Content: Found the Pearl Residence disappointing for the price (around $200 AU per night) - expected much better. We had a one room apartment which was very spacious but the 1980's decor was very tired and the room was quite dirty (found old food in fridge, blankets dirty, floor dirty, shower curtain with mould, stains on walls etc). Smoke smell prevalent which made me feel quite ill. The 'free' breakfast was also disappointing - very limited in variety and food very ordinary tasting. Staff service was ok but refused to book taxis for us. Internet service in lobby was not working. Booked through travel agent. The only reason we stayed here was due to the 24hr checkin service which was fine. Definately would not stay here again nor recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Great budget hotel!”
Reviews.Author: reanna123
Reviews.Content: We were 3 girls going on my hen to Dubai and this was a great place. Close to all the local expat clubs and bars, cheap and cheerful. I emailed them lots of silly questions before travelling and they were happy to obilge. Staff were friendly, rooms clean. Would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: Rafee.Tajudien
Reviews.Content: If you are planning to use the Pearle Residence in Dubai, do not hesitate do not worry about the other reviews, what excellent service did we receive from this hotel. From the moment we where received at the airport by the chauffer to the day we checked out we really felt at home .The staff was always friendly and helpfull. We were treated as if we were the only guests. The rooms where neat and clean, any request that was given to the staff was dealt with promptly, be it room service or requesting for the porter. The breakfast was also delicious. Bottom line, you will receive 5 star treatment at the hotel. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK GUYS, WILL Definitely USE THIS HOTEL AGAIN. Rafee Tajudien Cape Town. South Africa

Reviews.Title: “bad business practices”
Reviews.Author: JBruno
Reviews.Content: Our travel agent booked 2 apartments for us for a 3 night stay. We had our record locator and confirmation on hand once we arrived at check-in. The manager on duty refused to honor the confirmed rate that we were quoted and insisted that we pay 3 times the amount if wanted to stay there! We refused and decided to stay elsewhere. The manager then said that he would charge our credit card the first night rate of $259 as a cancellation fee if we left. I travel extensively for business and for pleasure and have never experienced such blatant "thievery". I would not recommend this hotel. Beware! I have sent a complaint letter to ATEL and I am waiting for a reply. On a positive note, we stayed at the Savoy Apartments right down the road which was wonderful. Nice rooms with a kind and helpful staff.

HotelInfo.Name: Pearl Residence
HotelInfo.Address: Al Mankhool St, PO Box 47385, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
